messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/11/03 7:26:49 PM, lurningathome@... writes:

<< I would like to know hwo in the worl is big bird only 6 years old.. >>

The same way Bart Simpson is always ten years old.

It's only a character. It's fiction. Big Bird's a costume.

I would like to know hwo in the worl is big bird only 6 years old..

The kids were watching with the younger ones on a show that contained the
